entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry is mentioned as having wanted to talk to Sirius and having had funny dreams.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Hermione's friend and a member of Dumbledore's Army. He is mentioned as having told Hermione about Harry's muttering in his sleep.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Ron's friend and a member of Dumbledore's Army. She is mentioned as being curious about Harry's dreams and wanting to know more about his Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who has passed away, but is still mentioned in the story as someone Harry wanted to talk to. He is also mentioned as wanting Harry to resume Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: Occlumency is a subject that Sirius wants Harry to resume learning, and Hermione keeps bringing up as a topic of conversation.

relationships.description: Harry wanted to talk to Sirius, but didn't confide in Ron and Hermione about the reason why.
Hermione is curious about Harry's dreams and keeps bringing up the topic of conversation.
Ron told Hermione a secret about Harry muttering in his sleep, which Hermione used to try and get more information out of Harry.
Sirius wants Harry to resume Occlumency lessons, which Hermione keeps bringing up as a topic of conversation.
